subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Saints took a 24-23 lead with 3:29 remaining, but Tom Brady’s 17-yard touchdown pass to Kenbrell Thompkins with five seconds left gave the Patriots the win.
snippet: The Saints took a 24-23 lead with 3:29 remaining, but Tom Brady’s 17-yard touchdown pass to Kenbrell Thompkins with five seconds left gave the Patriots the win.
